description: To keep all the masters of the house content, the "recruiters" place new slave boys throughout the castle for the masters to find; as if they were zookeepers feeding lions, hiding fresh meat to exercise the beasts' predatory instinct. Master Tyler gets excited when he discovers new slave jason tied up with a full erection. Our slave endures the ass-hook (counterweighted by a suspended chair), electro play, flogging, and a hard bondage fuck.
title: Master Tyler Saint and slave jason miller
